metadata.Title: CVE-2020-5313 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
libImaging/FliDecode.c in Pillow before 6.2.2 has an FLI buffer overflow.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-5313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

python-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.2
python-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.2
python3-pil - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.2
python3-pil.imagetk - 5.1.0-1ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> in trusty code affected is in libimaging/FileDecode.c.

criterions.comment: pillow package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.1.0-1ubuntu0.2').
